description:
What will Kiriyama and Takahashi talk about? Will it end well? Let`s hope the cute kitties can teach us how to play shogi!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Child of God (Part Three) Continued / Important Things. Important Matters. / Teach Me How to Play Shogi
Kamisama no Kodomo (Sono 3) Shouzen / Taisetsu na Mono. Taisetsu na Koto. / Shougi Oshiete
L`enfant de Dieu (Partie 3) Préface / Les personnes qui me sont chères. Les choses qui me sont chères. / Apprends-moi le shogi
ابن الإله (الجزء 3) تتمة / أشياء مهمة، أمور مهمة / علمني كيف ألعب الشوغي
神さまの子供 (その③)承前 / 大切なもの. 大切なこと. / 将棋おしえて
신의 아이 (세 번째 이야기) (이어서) / 소중한 것, 소중한 일 / 장기 가르쳐 줘
